summary:
A website is a collection of web pages grouped together under one domain name. These pages can share related content and are connected through hyperlinks. Websites serve various purposes, like providing news, education, or entertainment. Some popular sites include Google, YouTube, and Facebook.

The World Wide Web is made up of all public websites. There are also private websites that only specific people can access, like a company's internal site. People can view websites on different devices using a web browser.
title: Website
